  2. Attorney Warns His Voice was Cloned by AI in Phone Scam That Nearly Tricked His Dad Out of $35k  Good News Network
  3. Fla. pol targeted in elaborate AI ‘car crash’ scam — which almost fooled his dad into forking over $35K  New York Post

item.title: WATCH LIVE: ‘AI + 2024 Elections: Navigating A Messy Information Space’ hosted by Stephanie Sy - PBS NewsHour
item.description:
1. WATCH LIVE: ‘AI + 2024 Elections: Navigating A Messy Information Space’ hosted by Stephanie Sy  PBS NewsHour
  2. When to worry about AI and the election  GZERO Media
  3. Apocalypse later?  Atlantic Council
  4. 4 ways AI can be used and abused in the 2024 election, from deepfakes to foreign interference  The Conversation Indonesia
  5. How to Protect Personal Information During Election Season  WDBJ
